text: Daniel S. Paletko (December 21, 1950December 29, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was born in Dearborn Heights, Michigan. From 2003 to 2004, he was a member of the Michigan House of Representatives. Paletko was Mayor of Dearborn Heights from 2004 until his death. Paletko died on December 29, 2020 in Dearborn Heights from COVID-19 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Michigan Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Michigan
title: Daniel S. Paletko
